  • Constructor Details

    • Edge

      protected Edge (Vertex source, Vertex destination, boolean selected)
      Constructor of which specifies the source, destination and whether the edge is selected. Mathematically speaking, the source vertex is which this edge is incident from and the destination vertex is whcih this edge is incident to.
      Parameters:
      source - the source vertex
      destination - the destination vertex
      selected - whether the edge is selected

  • Method Details

    • isSelected

      public boolean isSelected()
      Returns true if this edge is selected. Otherwise, returns false.
      Specified by:
      isSelected in interface Icon
      Returns:
      true if this edge is selected; otherwise, returns false.

      public void setSelected (boolean selected)
      It sets the edge as selected or not.
      Specified by:
      setSelected in interface Icon
      Parameters:
      selected - if true, set this edge as selected; otherwise, set this edge as not selected.
